plot: A brutal businessman, Vilhelm Gerner, triggers a stock speculation by providing false information. This ruins his partners. They both commit suicide. Later, Gerner is found dead.
title: Mannen som alla ville mörda
plot_es: A brutal businessman, Vilhelm Gerner, triggers a stock speculation by providing false information. This ruins his partners. They both commit suicide. Later, Gerner is found dead.
plot_en: A brutal businessman, Vilhelm Gerner, triggers a stock speculation by providing false information. This ruins his partners. They both commit suicide. Later, Gerner is found dead.
